title: Submitting to God When It's Hard
itunes:author: Guest: Rosie Makinney
itunes:summary:
The Bible says that wives should submit to their husbands, but that Scripture should never be used in an abusive way. This is especially true if trust in the relationship has been harmed by a pornography addiction. John, Greg and Erin address when biblical submission is misused and how community can help a marriage that's been shaken by a porn struggle. Featuring Mrs. Rosie Makinney.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY


Receive the book "Fight For Love" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-23?refcd=1483601


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/submitting-to-god-when-its-hard/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/rescuing-your-marriage-from-pornography-digital-download/?refcd=1453806


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
